name: @oriana/cdk
description: CDK Infrastructure for Oriana Order Tracking API

scripts.dev: npm run synth:dev && sam local start-api -t cdk.out/ApiStack-dev.template.json --env-vars env.local.json --warm-containers LAZY --skip-pull-image --docker-network host
scripts.dev:eager: npm run synth:dev && sam local start-api -t cdk.out/ApiStack-dev.template.json --env-vars env.local.json --warm-containers EAGER --skip-pull-image --docker-network host
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run clean && npm run dev
scripts.dev:debug: npm run synth:dev && sam local start-api -t cdk.out/ApiStack-dev.template.json --env-vars env.local.json --warm-containers LAZY --skip-pull-image --docker-network host --debug
scripts.dev:quick: cdk synth ApiStack-dev && sam local start-api -t cdk.out/ApiStack-dev.template.json --env-vars env.local.json --warm-containers LAZY --skip-pull-image --docker-network host
scripts.invoke:po: npm run synth:dev && sam local invoke poFunction -t cdk.out/ApiStack-dev.template.json --env-vars env.local.json --skip-pull-image
scripts.invoke:po:event: npm run synth:dev && sam local invoke poFunction -t cdk.out/ApiStack-dev.template.json --env-vars env.local.json -e events/po-create.json
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run presynth && cdk deploy ApiStack-dev --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:qa: npm run presynth && cdk deploy ApiStack-qa --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run presynth && cdk deploy ApiStack-prod
